htw.vs1.filesystem.FileSystem.virtual

Class MountPointFolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • htw.vs1.filesystem.FileSystem.virtual.AbstractFSObject
      • htw.vs1.filesystem.FileSystem.virtual.LocalFSObject
        • htw.vs1.filesystem.FileSystem.virtual.LocalFolder
          • htw.vs1.filesystem.FileSystem.virtual.MountPointFolder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Folder, FSObject

    public class MountPointFolder
extends LocalFolder
    The MountPointFolder contains all distributed sub filesystems which should be unified in one filesystem. Created by Felix on 30.09.2015.
